quizzes.title: Does She Really Love You?
quizzes.description: Find out the truth about her feelings with this revealing quiz

questions.text: When you text her, how long does she usually take to reply?

options.text: It depends on what I say

questions.text: Does she remember small details about your life?

options.text: Not really, I have to remind her
She barely knows my last name

questions.text: How does she act when you're around her friends?
When you're going through a hard time, she...

options.text: Drops everything to be there for me

questions.text: Does she make future plans that include you?

options.text: All the time! We plan everything together
Only if I bring it up first

results.title: Red Flag Alert üö©
results.description: Based on your answers, it seems like she might not be as invested as you are. Her actions don't show the signs of someone truly in love. It might be time for an honest conversation about where this is going.

results.title: Mixed Signals ü§î
results.description: There are some positive signs, but also some concerning ones. She might be interested but holding back, or still figuring out her feelings. Keep your eyes open and watch for consistent patterns.

results.title: Looking Promising! üíõ
results.description: Good news! She shows many signs of genuine care and interest. While nobody's perfect, she seems to value you and the relationship. Keep nurturing what you have!

results.title: She's Totally Into You! üíñ
results.description: Congratulations! All signs point to real, genuine love. She prioritizes you, remembers the little things, and sees you in her future. You've found something special - cherish it!

quizzes.title: Does He Really Love You?
quizzes.description: Discover the truth about his feelings once and for all

questions.text: When you need help with something, he...

options.text: Shows up without me even asking

questions.text: How does he talk about you to others?

options.text: I'm not sure he tells people about me

questions.text: During arguments, how does he handle it?

options.text: Stays calm and wants to work it out

questions.text: Does he make effort to spend quality time together?

options.text: Yes! He plans dates and activities
Only when nothing else is going on

questions.text: How does he react when something good happens to you?

options.text: Celebrates like it's his own win!

results.title: Warning Signs üö©
results.description: Girl, the signs aren't great. His behavior suggests he's not putting in the effort a loving partner should. You deserve someone who shows up for you consistently.

results.title: Hmm... Unclear ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
results.description: There's potential here, but also some concerning patterns. He might care but struggle to show it, or he might be unsure himself. Communication is key right now.

results.title: He Cares! üíô
results.description: Great news! He shows genuine signs of caring about you. He's not perfect (who is?), but his actions show that you matter to him. Keep building on this foundation!

results.title: He's In Love! üíï
results.description: You've got a keeper! His actions consistently show love, respect, and care. He prioritizes you, supports your wins, and works through the tough stuff. This is the real deal!

quizzes.title: Is Your Relationship Toxic?
quizzes.description: Take this quiz to find out if your relationship is healthy or harmful

questions.text: After spending time with your partner, you usually feel...
When you express your feelings or concerns, your partner...

options.text: Sometimes dismisses but usually comes around
Gets defensive or turns it on me
Mocks me or uses it against me later

questions.text: How often do you find yourself apologizing to keep the peace?

options.text: Rarely - we both apologize when wrong
Sometimes, even if I'm not sure why

questions.text: Does your partner try to control who you see or what you do?

options.text: No, they trust and support my independence
Gets upset when I see certain people
Yes - I've lost friends because of them

questions.text: How do you feel about yourself since being in this relationship?

results.title: Healthy Relationship üíö
results.description: Great news! Your relationship shows healthy patterns. You both respect each other, communicate well, and support each other's growth. Keep nurturing this positive connection!

results.title: Some Yellow Flags üíõ
results.description: Your relationship has some areas that need attention. While not necessarily toxic, there are patterns that could become problematic. Open communication and possibly couples counseling could help.

results.title: Concerning Patterns üß°
results.description: There are significant warning signs in your relationship. These patterns can be damaging to your mental health and self-esteem. Consider talking to a trusted friend or professional about what you're experiencing.

results.title: Toxic Alert üî¥
results.description: Your answers indicate serious toxic patterns. This relationship may be harmful to your wellbeing. Please consider reaching out to a counselor, therapist, or domestic support hotline. You deserve to be in a healthy, loving relationship.

quizzes.title: What Type of Lover Are You?
quizzes.description: Discover your unique love language and romantic personality

questions.text: Your ideal date night would be...

options.text: Cozy night in with movies and cuddles

questions.text: When you fall for someone, you typically...

options.text: Fall slowly, after getting to know them deeply
Fall fast and hard - when I know, I know!
Focus on making them feel cared for
Keep things light until I'm really sure

questions.text: In relationships, you value most...
When there's a problem in your relationship, you...

options.text: Want to talk it through completely
Try to fix it by showing more love
Need some space to process first

questions.text: Your friends would describe your love life as...

results.title: The Deep Soul üåô
results.description: You love with your whole heart and crave emotional intimacy above all else. You need a partner who can match your depth and isn't afraid of vulnerability. When you love, it's profound and transformative.

results.title: The Flame üî•
results.description: You love intensely and aren't afraid to show it! Chemistry is crucial for you, and you bring excitement and energy to your relationships. You need a partner who can keep up with your fiery spirit.

results.title: The Giver üå∏
results.description: You show love through actions and care. Making your partner feel loved and supported is your superpower. You create a safe haven in your relationships but remember to let yourself receive too!

results.title: The Butterfly ü¶ã
results.description: You love with freedom and authenticity. You need space to be yourself while also connecting deeply. The right partner will understand that your independence makes your love even more meaningful.

quizzes.title: Are You Ready for a Relationship?
quizzes.description: Find out if you're truly ready to commit or if you need more you-time

questions.text: How do you feel about being single right now?

options.text: Loving it! Not sure I want to change

questions.text: What's your relationship with your ex(es)?

options.text: Learned from it and moved on
What ex? I don't think about them

questions.text: How would you describe your current mental/emotional state?

options.text: Struggling - need someone to complete me
Working on myself, some good and bad days
In a good place, stable and growing

questions.text: Why do you want a relationship?

options.text: I have love to give and share
To have fun and see where it goes

questions.text: How much time could you realistically give a partner?

options.text: All of it - I have nothing else going on
Balanced - I have my own life too

results.title: Focus on You First üíú
results.description: Right now, you might benefit from spending more time on yourself before jumping into a relationship. Work on your healing, find your own happiness, and the right person will come when you're truly ready.

results.title: Almost There! üå±
results.description: You're on the right track but might have a few things to work through first. Keep growing, stay open, and don't rush. You're closer to being ready than you think!

results.title: Ready to Mingle! üíï
results.description: You're in a great place! You've done the work on yourself, you know what you want, and you're ready to share your life with someone. Get out there - love is waiting!

results.title: Relationship Goals üèÜ
results.description: You're absolutely ready! You're emotionally mature, have healthy expectations, and want a relationship for the right reasons. The lucky person who finds you is going to be very happy!
